participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Quiet and introspective, with a deep focus on spiritual growth and inner peace.
participant_1.background: i am a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i haven't spoken in three months. i like meditation. i live in alaska.

participant_2.name: Martha
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat bitter about the passage of time, but still holds onto her artistic roots.
participant_2.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i'm a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.
